'''Daniel Krewski''' is an [[Academic]] who is Professor of Medicine and Professor of [[Epidemiology]] and Community Medicine at the [[University of Ottawa]], where his focus is [[health risk assessment]] in the Institute of Population Health.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.medicine.uottawa.ca/epid/eng/krewskibio.html|title=Daniel Krewski, MHA, MSc, PhD: Director, R. Samuel McLaughlin Centre for Population Health Risk Assessment|publisher=University of Ottawa|accessdate=27 February 2011}}</ref>
